title: Unstoppable Domains
subtitle: Replace cryptocurrency addresses with a human readable name.

alert.title: Just purchased a domain?
alert.description: If you just purchased a domain, please check back in a few minutes for the transaction to be completed. Once completed, your domain will appear on this list.

what-do-you-want-to-do-with-domain: What do you want to do with the domain?
link-your-wallets: Link your wallets to this domain
publish-your-website: Publish your website to IPFS with a zip file or IPFS Hash
resolve-domain-description: When sending a token to apple.crypto it will be deposited to the wallet entered bellow.
insufficient-balance-advice: Add more ETH to your wallet or pay with Credit Card
processing-registration-advice: Please do not exit the Dapp or close your browser. It takes a short while for registration.
